SYN_2_7_3165:
[Indication]
Malignant central airway obstruction, retained metallic stent.
[Anesthesia]
General.
[Description]
1. Flex bronch: TBM, RMS tumor, LMS embedded stent with pus. BAL done.
2. Rigid bronch inserted.
3. LMS: Stent removal using APC, balloon dilation, and forceps.
4. RMS: Tumor debulking via APC.
5. Customized Y-stent placed to patent airways.
[Plan]
Admit. Rad Onc consult. Stent removal 2 wks.
